String.string: Report to Fraya at Allemantheia Headquarters. [Speak with {@linkcreature:72#1103#Arshadh} to enter the Allemantheia Headquarters.]
Go to Velika and find Priestess Ciebel at Velik's Steps. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received.)
Meet with Elleon in Castanica in Ostgarath Province. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received.)
Speak with Commander Fraya in Castanica.
Go to the Hungry Caverns and find Prefect {@linkcreature:208#1002#Smernav} at the Avenger Outpost. (Use the {@linkcreature:61#1009#Teleportal} to go to Avenger Outpost.)
Kill Dulinka and his mekkitars at the southern end of the Cavern of Shackles. [Use the elevator or speak with {@linkcreature:208#2000#Tadan} to go to Hungry Caverns Vaults.]
Elleon is nearby. Report to {@linkcreature:208#1041#Elleon} that you obtained Gluorn's Ledger.
Bring Gluorn's Ledger to Commander Fraya in Castanica.
Bring Gluorn's Ledger to Commander Fraya in Castanica.
